Detailed Description

Stop the underlying parameters (or values) from growing past a fixed absolute limit Useful if you have an RL process that drives parameters past the point where exponentiating them causes overflow problems.

void libpg::HardLimitTransform::checkParams (  )  [protected, virtual]

The only non-trivial routine.. just make sure all parameter values are within the maximum abosolute val. Limit them if they are.
